00078     void GraphicsManager::Construct(const Whole &Width_, const Whole &Height_, const bool &FullScreen_ )
00079     {
00080         Settings.Fullscreen = FullScreen_;
00081         Settings.RenderHeight = Height_;
00082         Settings.RenderWidth = Width_;
00083         this->Priority = 0;
00084         this->FrameDelay = 0;
00085     }

00087     void GraphicsManager::CreateRenderWindow()
00088     {
00089         //InitSDL();
00090         SDL_Init(SDL_INIT_VIDEO);
00091         size_t RC = 0;
00092         //http://wiki.libsdl.org/moin.cgi/SDL_Init?highlight=%28\bCategoryAPI\b%29|%28SDLFunctionTemplate%29 // for more flags
00093 
00094                 try
00095                 {
00096                         //Setup the SDL render window
00097                         SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER, 1);
00098                         SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_CONTEXT_MAJOR_VERSION, 2);
00099             SDL_GL_SetAttribute(SDL_GL_CONTEXT_MINOR_VERSION, 1);
00100                         if(Settings.Fullscreen)
00101                         {
00102                             this->SDLwindow = SDL_CreateWindow( GameWorld->GetWindowName().c_str(), SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED, SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED, Settings.RenderWidth, Settings.RenderHeight, SDL_WINDOW_OPENGL | SDL_WINDOW_FULLSCREEN | SDL_WINDOW_SHOWN );
00103                             //this->SDLscreen = SDL_SetVideoMode( RenderWidth, RenderHeight,0, SDL_OPENGL | SDL_FULLSCREEN );
00104                         }else{
00105                 this->SDLwindow = SDL_CreateWindow( GameWorld->GetWindowName().c_str(), SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED, SDL_WINDOWPOS_CENTERED, Settings.RenderWidth, Settings.RenderHeight, SDL_WINDOW_OPENGL | SDL_WINDOW_SHOWN );
00106                 //this->SDLscreen = SDL_SetVideoMode( RenderWidth, RenderHeight,0, SDL_OPENGL );
00107                         }
00108                         RC = (size_t)SDL_GL_CreateContext(this->SDLwindow);
00109                         //SDL_WM_SetCaption(GameWorld->GetWindowName().c_str(), NULL);
00110                         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00111             GameWorld->Log("Successfully Setup SDL");
00112             #endif
00113                 }catch (exception& e) {
00114                     GameWorld->Log("Failed to Setup SDL");
00115                         GameWorld->LogAndThrow(e.what());
00116                 }
00117 
00118         //Start Ogre Without a native render window
00119         try
00120         {
00121             //crossplatform::WaitMilliseconds(1000);
00122             OgreGameWindow = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().initialise(false, GameWorld->GetWindowName());
00123             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00124             GameWorld->Log("Setup Ogre Window");
00125             #endif
00126         }catch (exception& e) {
00127                     GameWorld->Log("Failed to Setup Ogre Window");
00128                         GameWorld->LogAndThrow(e.what());
00129                 }
00130 
00131         //Configure Ogre to render to the SDL window
00132         Ogre::NameValuePairList *misc;
00133         misc=(Ogre::NameValuePairList*) crossplatform::GetSDLOgreBinder(SDLwindow,RC);
00134         OgreGameWindow = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().createRenderWindow(GameWorld->GetWindowName(), Settings.RenderWidth, Settings.RenderHeight, Settings.Fullscreen, misc);
00135         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00136         GameWorld->Log("Bound Ogre to an SDL window");
00137         #endif
00138 
00139         InitViewportAndCamera();
00140     }
00141 
00142     void GraphicsManager::DestroyRenderWindow()
00143     {
00144         OgreGameWindow->destroy();
00145     }

00147     void GraphicsManager::InitSDL()
00148     {
00149         /// @todo TODO set multithreaded SDL so it will the run event manager in another thread
00150         //Get what is needed for SDL started
00151         if (SDL_Init(SDL_INIT_VIDEO) < 0) {
00152             GameWorld->Log("Error 2: Unable to init SDL, SDL Error Follows:");
00153             GameWorld->LogAndThrow(SDL_GetError());
00154         }
00155         SDLBeenInitialized = true;
00156         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00157         GameWorld->Log("Initialized SDL");
00158         #endif
00159     }
00160 
00161     void GraphicsManager::ShutdownSDL()
00162     {
00163         //SDL_DeleteContext();
00164         SDL_DestroyWindow(SDLwindow);
00165         //SDL_FreeSurface(SDLscreen);
00166         SDL_Quit();
00167     }

00169     void GraphicsManager::InitViewportAndCamera()
00170     {
00171         //setup a default camera unless has been setup yet
00172         Camera* camera = NULL;
00173         if(GameWorld->GetCameraManager()==0)
00174         {
00175             GameWorld->AddManager(new phys::CameraManager(0));
00176         }
00177         camera = GameWorld->GetCameraManager()->GetDefaultCamera();
00178         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00179         GameWorld->Log("Created Default Camera");
00180         #endif
00181 
00182         //viewport connects camera and render window
00183         Ogre::Viewport* OgreViewport = NULL;
00184         OgreViewport = OgreGameWindow->addViewport(camera->GetOgreCamera());
00185         GameWorld->GetCameraManager()->Viewports["Viewport1"] = OgreViewport;
00186 
00187         //setting the aspect ratio must be done after we setup the viewport
00188         camera->SetAspectRatio( (Real)(OgreViewport->getActualWidth()) / (Real)(OgreViewport->getActualHeight()) );
00189         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00190         GameWorld->Log("Configured Viewport and Aspect Ratio");
00191         #endif
00192     }

00194     void GraphicsManager::UpdateWindowStats()
00195     {
00196         GameWorld->Log("Updating Screen Mode. ");
00197         //OgreGameWindow->destroy();
00198         if(Settings.Fullscreen)
00199         {
00200             GameWorld->Log("Setting SDL. ");
00201             this->SDLscreen = SDL_SetVideoMode( Settings.RenderWidth, Settings.RenderHeight,0, SDL_OPENGL | SDL_FULLSCREEN);
00202             GameWorld->Log("Setting Ogre. ");
00203             //OgreGameWindow->setFullscreen(true,RenderWidth,RenderHeight);
00204         }else{
00205             GameWorld->Log("Setting SDL. ");
00206             this->SDLscreen = SDL_SetVideoMode( Settings.RenderWidth, Settings.RenderHeight,0, SDL_OPENGL );
00207             GameWorld->Log("Setting Ogre. ");
00208             //OgreGameWindow->setFullscreen(false,RenderWidth,RenderHeight);
00209         }
00210         Ogre::NameValuePairList *misc;
00211         //misc=(Ogre::NameValuePairList*) crossplatform::GetSDLOgreBinder();
00212         //OgreGameWindow->create(GameWorld->GetWindowName(), RenderHeight, RenderWidth, Fullscreen, misc);
00213 
00214         GameWorld->Log("Updating Viewport. ");
00215         Ogre::Viewport* OgreViewport = GameWorld->GetCameraManager()->GetOgreViewport("Viewport1");
00216         OgreViewport->setDimensions(0,0,1,1);
00217         OgreViewport->getCamera()->setAspectRatio((Real)(OgreViewport->getActualWidth()) / (Real)(OgreViewport->getActualHeight()));
00218 
00219         ActorContainerVector* ActorMan = static_cast<ActorContainerVector*>(GameWorld->GetActorManager());
00220         //for( std::vector<ActorBase*>::iterator cur = ActorMan->begin() ; cur != ActorMan->end() ; cur++ )
00221         //    (*cur)->InitEntity(true);
00222 
00223         Ogre::CompositorManager::getSingleton().reloadAll();
00224         //Ogre::GpuProgramManager::getSingleton().reloadAll();
00225         //Ogre::HighLevelGpuProgramManager::getSingleton().reloadAll();
00226         //Ogre::FontManager::getSingleton().reloadAll();
00227         //Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton().reloadAll();
00228         Ogre::TextureManager::getSingleton().reloadAll();
00229 
00230         //GameWorld->GetResourceManager()->ParseMaterialScripts();
00231 
00232         Ogre::MeshManager::getSingleton().reloadAll();
00233         //Ogre::SkeletonManager::getSingleton().reloadAll();
00234 
00235         for( std::vector<ActorBase*>::iterator cur = ActorMan->begin() ; cur != ActorMan->end() ; cur++ )
00236             (*cur)->InitEntity(true);
00237         //GameWorld->GetUIManager()->RedrawAll(true);
00238         GameWorld->Log("Done Updating Screen Mode. ");
00239     }

00249     //returns: false if changes could not be made
00250     void GraphicsManager::setFullscreen(const bool &Fullscreen_)
00251     {
00252         if(!GraphicsInitialized)
00253         {
00254             Settings.Fullscreen = Fullscreen_;
00255             return;
00256         }
00257         /// @todo TODO: Need to attempt to switch to fullscreen here
00258         /// @todo TODO: We really should double check that going into fullscreen worked the way we wanted, this fails in too many games
00259 
00260         if(SDL_SetWindowFullscreen(SDLwindow, Fullscreen_?SDL_TRUE:SDL_FALSE ) > 0)
00261             Settings.Fullscreen = Fullscreen_;
00262     }

00277     void GraphicsManager::setRenderHeight(const Whole &Height_)
00278     {
00279         if(!GraphicsInitialized)
00280         {
00281             Settings.RenderHeight = Height_;
00282             return;
00283         }
00284         /// @todo TODO: Need to attempt to update resolution here
00285         setRenderResolution(Settings.RenderWidth,Height_);
00286     }

00299     void GraphicsManager::setRenderResolution(const Whole &Width_, const Whole &Height_)
00300     {
00301         if(!GraphicsInitialized)
00302         {
00303             Settings.RenderWidth = Width_;
00304             Settings.RenderHeight = Height_;
00305             return;
00306         }
00307         /// @todo TODO: Need to attempt to update resolution here
00308         if(Settings.Fullscreen)
00309         {
00310             SDL_DisplayMode CurrentDisplay;
00311             SDL_GetWindowDisplayMode(SDLwindow,&CurrentDisplay);
00312             CurrentDisplay.w = Width_;
00313             CurrentDisplay.h = Height_;
00314             if(SDL_SetWindowDisplayMode(SDLwindow,&CurrentDisplay) > 0)
00315             {
00316                 Settings.RenderWidth = Width_;
00317                 Settings.RenderHeight = Height_;
00318                 return;
00319             }
00320         }else{
00321             SDL_SetWindowSize(SDLwindow,Settings.RenderWidth,Settings.RenderHeight);
00322         }
00323     }

00325     void GraphicsManager::setRenderOptions(const GraphicsSettings& NewSettings)
00326     {
00327         if(!GraphicsInitialized)
00328         {
00329             Settings = NewSettings;
00330             return;
00331         }
00332         setFullscreen(NewSettings.Fullscreen);
00333         setRenderResolution(NewSettings.RenderWidth,NewSettings.RenderHeight);
00334     }

00343     //preset save location
00344     bool GraphicsManager::ShowGraphicsSettingDialog()
00345     {
00346         try
00347         {
00348             return Ogre::Root::getSingleton().showConfigDialog();
00349         } catch (exception& e) {
00350             this->GameWorld->Log("Ogre settings windows from main UI or mandatory setting failure");
00351             this->GameWorld->Log(e.what());
00352             return false;
00353         }
00354     }

00388     String GraphicsManager::GetRenderSystemName()
00389     {
00390         String Renderer = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().getRenderSystem()->getName();
00391         Whole EditPos = Renderer.find("Rendering");
00392         Renderer.erase(EditPos - 1);
00393         return Renderer;
00394     }

00406     void GraphicsManager::ResetRenderTimer()

00411     //Inherited From ManagerBase
00412     void GraphicsManager::Initialize()
00413     {
00414         CreateRenderWindow();
00415         this->RenderTimer = new Ogre::Timer();
00416 
00417         Ogre::ConfigOptionMap& CurrentRendererOptions = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().getRenderSystem()->getConfigOptions();
00418         for( Ogre::ConfigOptionMap::iterator configItr = CurrentRendererOptions.begin() ;
00419             configItr != CurrentRendererOptions.end() ; configItr++)
00420         {
00421             if( (configItr)->first == "Video Mode" )
00422             {
00423                 for( Whole X = 0 ; X < (configItr)->second.possibleValues.size() ; X++ )
00424                     SupportedResolutions.push_back((configItr)->second.possibleValues[X]);
00425                 continue;
00426             }
00427             if( (configItr)->first == "Rendering Device" )
00428             {
00429                 for( Whole Y = 0 ; Y < (configItr)->second.possibleValues.size() ; Y++ )
00430                     SupportedDevices.push_back((configItr)->second.possibleValues[Y]);
00431                 continue;
00432             }
00433         }
00434 
00435         GraphicsInitialized = true;
00436     }
00437 
00438     void GraphicsManager::DoMainLoopItems()
00439     {
00440         Ogre::WindowEventUtilities::messagePump();
00441         crossplatform::RenderPhysWorld(this->OgreGameWindow, this->SDLwindow);
00442 
00443         //Do Time Calculations to Determine Rendering Time
00444         this->GameWorld->SetFrameTime( this->RenderTimer->getMilliseconds() );
00445         this->RenderTimer->reset();
00446         if(this->GameWorld->GetTargetFrameTime() > this->GameWorld->GetFrameTime()){
00447             FrameDelay++;
00448         }else if(this->GameWorld->GetTargetFrameTime() == this->GameWorld->GetFrameTime()){
00449         }else{
00450             if (0<FrameDelay){
00451                 FrameDelay--;
00452             }else{
00453                 FrameDelay=0;
00454             }
00455         }
00456         crossplatform::WaitMilliseconds( FrameDelay );
00457     }

00459     ManagerBase::ManagerTypeName GraphicsManager::GetType() const
00460         { return ManagerBase::GraphicsManager; }

00462     bool GraphicsManager::PostMainLoopItems()
00463     {
00464         this->GameWorld->GetEventManager()->AddEvent(new EventRenderTime(this->GameWorld->GetFrameTime()));
00465         return ManagerBase::PostMainLoopItems();
00466     }
